description: A comprehensive iOS Swift application template demonstrating advanced Salesforce Mobile SDK integration using MobileSync data framework. This template provides a full-featured contact management app with offline sync capabilities, search functionality, and a modern SwiftUI interface with split-view navigation.

useCase.primary: Production-ready iOS app with full Salesforce data synchronization
useCase.when: Use this template when you need to create a production-ready iOS app with full Salesforce data synchronization capabilities.

extensionPoints.name: Salesforce Objects
extensionPoints.description: Add new Salesforce objects beyond the default Contact
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Create new SObject data classes following the ContactSObjectData pattern Implement required protocols and constants Add to SObjects.swift registry

extensionPoints.name: UI Components
extensionPoints.description: Extend the SwiftUI interface with additional components
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Add new SwiftUI views following existing patterns Implement navigation between views Customize split-view behavior

templateVariables.name: projectName
templateVariables.description: The name of the iOS project
